original_text: Or I might send wild animals to kill the people of that nation. Nobody would travel through that place. The wild animals would make it too dangerous to travel there.
korean_text: 가령 내가 사나운 짐승을 그 땅에 다니게 하여 그 땅을 황폐하게 하여 사람이 그 짐승 때문에 능히 다니지 못하게 한다 하자

sentences.original_text: Or I might send wild animals
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 내가 들짐승을 보낼 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: to kill the people of that nation
Nobody would travel through that place
The wild animals would make it too dangerous
